backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and a public contact form, with admin-only queries for viewing submissions and counts.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report mapping implemented frontend features to files, components, test requirements, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all frontend source files, components, hooks, and configuration for documentation and planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining global design tokens, OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, page title, and mounts the React application to the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing the full landing page by rendering header, all content sections, and footer in order.
frontend/src/components/charts/RiskBarCh: Simple SVG-free bar chart component visualizing low, medium, and high risk levels as animated horizontal bars.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleLin: Renders a simple responsive SVG line chart with hardcoded semester performance data, including grid lines, area fill, data points, and labels.
frontend/src/components/demos/Admissions: Interactive demo form that checks college course eligibility based on marks, category, and course using simple rule-based logic and displays a success or failure message.
frontend/src/components/demos/ChatbotMoc: Mock AI chatbot UI with predefined keyword-based responses for common college queries, simulating message exchange with delayed bot replies.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying an icon, title, and description with hover effects and staggered fade-in animation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, quick navigation links, social media icons, and a copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Contact form component that collects user details and submits them via a custom hook, handling loading, success, and error states with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation header with smooth-scroll links, scroll state styling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Static informational section describing the Smart College System, its mission, vision, and future scope of AI in education using styled content blocks.
frontend/src/components/sections/Analyti: Dashboard section showcasing analytics features, embedding performance and risk charts along with descriptive text and AI-driven improvement suggestions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Renders a three-column benefits section highlighting tailored advantages for students, faculty, and administrators using icon-labeled cards and bullet lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays a contact section with a contact form, institutional contact details (email, phone, address), and office hours in a two-column responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Dashboa: Shows a preview section with mock dashboard images and captions to demonstrate analytics, attendance, and marks tracking features.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaceAtt: Presents a conceptual demo of face recognition attendance, including workflow steps, mock camera UI, diagrams, and listed benefits without real biometric processing.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Defines and renders a grid of core AI-driven platform features using reusable FeatureCard components and descriptive metadata.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Implements the landing hero section with headline messaging, call-to-action buttons that smooth-scroll to sections, and a prominent illustrative image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Interac: Renders a section containing interactive demo components for admissions eligibility checking and a chatbot mock interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, handling authenticated vs anonymous identities and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context, hook, and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY AuthClient, including login, logout, persisted identities, and detailed login status flags.
Defines a React Query mutation hook that submits contact form data via a backend actor and invalidates related cached queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining a blue/white academic theme with CSS variables, light/dark modes, typography, accessibility focus styles, and reusable animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app, wiring up React Query and the Internet Identity provider and loading global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from query strings or hash routes, persisting them in sessionStorage, and safely clearing sensitive parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, plugins, container settings, and extensive theme extensions mapped to CSS variables for colors, typography, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks high-level project goals, features, and versions for the Smart College System marketing website, including required sections, UI theme, and planned interactive demos.
